heroes.name: David Pearce
heroes.shortIntro: Negative-utilitarian transhumanist philosopher. Author of "The Hedonistic Imperative" and "The Abolitionist Project". Co-founder of Humanity+ (formerly the World Transhumanist Association).
heroes.what: Popularized suffering-focused ethics and the notion of "paradise engineering" within transhumanist movement. Argues for technological solutions to abolish suffering for all sentient beings. Authored The Anti-Speciesist Revolution.
see: and other work on hedweb.com
The Hedonistic Imperative group on Facebook. (As of December 2016, David is a frequent contributor.)

heroes.name: Michael Greger
heroes.shortIntro: Physician, dietician, professional speaker, writer. Advocates plant-based diet. A man behind NutritionFacts.org.
heroes.what: A prolific educator on whole-food, plant-based diets and health harms of eating animals. In his videos and articles on NutritionFacts.org, Greger briefly presents (with his signature touch of humor!) scientific studies relevant to a healthy vegan lifestyle. The site claims, "100% of all proceeds he has ever received from his books, DVDs, and speaking engagements has always and will always be donated to charity."
see: Nutrition Year-in-Reviews, e.g. Food as Medicine: Preventing & Treating the Most Dreaded Diseases with Diet

heroes.name: Matt Ball
